name: Potato Wars
description:
Sigrún and Unnur are two farmers that both dream of winning the potato competition and controlling the market price of potatoes, lowering it until the other farmer goes out of business.  But they have to grow their crops to succeed. 

They can blow potatoes out of their cannons into each others garden to ruin for the other. They can also blow potatoes at flying objects such as birds that carry potatoes in a bag and drones and balloons that either carries water to give the potatoes a growth boost or a shovel to harvest the potato crop.

You only need 3 keys each to control the game:

Player 1 
[a] = Move cannon up.
[s] = Shoot on release, you can hold down to gain force .
[d] = Move cannon down.

Player 2
[j] = Move cannon up .
[k] = Shoot on release, you can hold down to gain force.
[l] = Move cannon down.

In game you can use [esc] to go to menu.
In menu you can use [r] or [space] to restart or [esc] to exit game.

Credit:
Mountains: Painted HQ 2D Forest Medieval Background pack from Unity.co
Garden, Houses: Inspiration from Stardew Valley
Font: Pixel Font - Tripfive from Unity.com
Other artwork and all sound was made by the team.
